data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Ahuachapán, El Salvador. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ahuachapán, El Salvador
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Ahuachapán.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 30 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Ahuachapán, El Salvador.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Ahuachapán, El Salvador know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 149,817 believers in the state of Ahuachapán to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Turk people.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Ahuachapán, El Salvador to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 149,817 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ahuachapán, El Salvador has a population of 333,400.

We estimate Ahuachapán has 149,817 people who might know Jesus, 165,094 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 18,488 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, purify the 149,817 believers in the state of Ahuachapán to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.
